name: Custom straps v2 - Black/Black
description:
Made of ultrastrong and extrawide seatbelt material it uses as little hardware as needed. The only metal ring allows easy adjustment while riding – but at the same time an additional fabric above the ring protects the crank from scratches. The special angle in the foreholding part of the straps allows entering most easy while the tighter rearward part of the strap fixate your foot into the pedal.

Upperlayer: 5cm wide
straps: 2 cm wide

name: Ducth Grip Gloves
description:
These gloves are specially made to have more grip while riding your bike. Of course you can do more with these gloves..but the idea came out of cycle wear. We searched for Dutch brands with commitment to the fixed gear and messenger scene and collected shops, blogs and creatives and made a pattern with their logos. The print is made with a rubber based ink for extra grip. 

Made possible by following sponsors:
Cycle Works, Ehvfxd, Goodbikes, 24k Bike shop, Singlespeed.nl, Baschz, Pinwin/Lastplak, Infinity Express, Fuccit, Pristine, Rotterdam fixed gear, Dings, DMA, Rotterdamse fietskoerier, Urban Delight Tattoo, Demarrage Fietskoerier.nl, Breg Hanssen, Messaggi via Pedale, Bureau Atelier, Amsterdam Fixed, Custom Straps and off course Zlda.

name: Custom straps v2 + Dutch Grip Gloves
description: A set of Custom straps v2 of your choice together with a pair of  Dutch grip gloves.

name: Fixed Gear Jewelry - Complete bike
description: Just like the real ride, the jewelry sets are made of separate bicycle parts. “The difference with customary fixies, however,” explains Zelda, “is that in my design the parts are fixed in a somewhat illogical way. The female way”, she jokes. To design the set Zelda uses the classic frame with its recognizable shape and features. All together, each piece of jewelry forms one complete bike.
